subject: Re: [junit] FW: Code not working after upgrading to 1.6 from 1.4
msgSnippet: ... I didn t see a problem. Try a simpler test: assertNotNull(currentPage.getTableWithID( ... )); Try it with HtmlUnit. If HtmlUnit fails the same way, then
messageBody:
jeff.schlaver@... wrote:
>
>
> Can anyone see a problem with the following code segment?
>
> It worked with httpunit release1.4 now the call getTableWithID returns
> null, and none of the code has changed.

I didn't see a problem. Try a simpler test:

assertNotNull(currentPage.getTableWithID("..."));

Try it with HtmlUnit. If HtmlUnit fails the same way, then I'd bet your
HTML is wrong in a subtle, weird way that HttpUnit simply used to
tolerate and no longer does.

When in doubt, try a smaller test and smaller HTML.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
